Here is the list of astrological signs and their corresponding scores, along with a brief description:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries can be impulsive and reckless at times, but they're also fiercely loyal and adventurous.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Practical and dependable, Tauruses are known for their stability and sense of security, but they can also be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are often charming and communicative, but they can also be flighty and easily distracted.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Caring and nurturing, Cancers are deeply emotional and empathetic, but they can also be overly sensitive and clingy.
5. Leo - 8.5/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos are natural performers who crave attention and admiration, but they can also be arrogant and dramatic.
6. Virgo - 7.5/10 - Analytical and hardworking, Virgos are meticulous and detail-oriented, but they can also be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans are charming and fair-minded, but they can also be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpions are private and perceptive, but they can also be vengeful and secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are enthusiastic and freedom-loving, but they can also be blunt and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns are ambitious and driven, but they can also be rigid and controlling.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are inventive and unconventional, but they can also be aloof and detached.
12. Pisces - 6.5/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, Pisces are empathetic and dreamy, but they can also be scattered and irresponsible.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics.
